author: dlydick
msg: Fixed bug in object_run_method() where a (Code_attribute *) was not
being properly calculated.
Updated ARCH_xxx() macros for better diagnostic support.
Minor documentation adjustments.

author: dlydick
msg: Filled out more opcode implementations.
Split out inner loop macros from opcode.c for better
maintainability.
Substitute portable_XXX() version of system calls and library calls.
Move static jmp_buf opcode_end_local_return from file scope into
opcode_run() as a local variable so it does not get overwritten
during recursive invocation of opcode_run() by opcodes like NEW
and INVOKExxx.
Add comments about which local variables are read and written
for each of the inner loop macros.
Substitute portable_XXX() version of system calls and library calls.
Updated ARCH_xxx() macros for better diagnostic support.
Minor documentation adjustments.

author: crossley
msg: Need to build before we can know whether to notify success or failure.

author: dlydick
msg: Added thread_delete() function and reference it instead of explicit
marking of status block as ~THREAD_STATUS_INUSE.
Updated ARCH_xxx() macros for better diagnostic support.
Minor documentation adjustments.

author: crossley
msg: Use plain attachment rather than uuencoded in body.
